etymology.description: Originally depicted a person lifting a beam from which bells and chimes hang -> representation of a tool or implement -> evolved to include chisel and large person for launching a great attack -> current form
etymology.interpretation: The character originates as a pictogram of a person lifting a beam, symbolizing a tool used in work, reflecting the idea of effort or task associated with various types of work.

examples.chinese: 工匠專心業在石頭上(工匠專心業在石頭上)，創造獨特紋理(創造獨特紋理)。
examples.pinyin: Gōngjiàng zhuānxīn yè zài shítou shàng, chuàngzào dútè wénlǐ.
examples.english: The craftsman carved unique textures on the stone with full concentration.

examples.chinese: 他用刻刀業出精美圖案(他用刻刀業出精美圖案)。
examples.pinyin: Tā yòng kèdāo yè chū jīngměi tú'àn.
